entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
